channel.title: Help with sql connection please!

item.title: Help with sql connection please!
item.dc:creator: @piczokid2 piczokid2
item.description:
@piczokid2 wrote:

im useing the source 1.50 - Haven MYSQL

now i need to make it work with mysql ive allready got the database but im not sure what sql feilds to link it to also ive used sql befor and made login websites but ive never done sql in java so i need some help please! heres some code in database.java

import java.sql.Connection; import java.sql.DriverManager; import java.sql.SQLException; import java.sql.Statement; import java.sql.ResultSet; import java.sql.Driver;

public class Database extends misc {

public static String MySQL = "www.freehyperspace5.com/phpmyadmin";
public static String MySQLUser = "runescapegulids2_admin";
public static String MySQLPass = "not shown";
public static Connection myConnection = null;</blockquote>

so do you think you can help me out i havent showed the password so i dont get pwned so please help me fix this problem thanks
